title: [BUG] Wingdings font not created in Mac OS
body:
**Description**

When creating typeface for wingdings font, the skiasharp returns as Helvetica. 

Font is available in the location : ~Library/Fonts

**Code**

`SKTypeface typeface = SKTypeface.FromFamilyName("Wingdings", SKFontStyleWeight.Normal, SKFontStyleWidth.Normal, SKFontStyleSlant.Upright);`

**Expected Behavior**

It must be return wingdings typeface.


**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  1.59.3
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2017
 - iOS:  12.1
 - macOS:  10.14

comments.author: Gillibald
comments.body: You need to load the font from stream if the font isn't installed on the system.

comments.author: mattleibow
